question: What documentary films were screened by the Films Division, to mark the celebration of Independence Day?
option1: Vice Roy’s House and Mangal Pandey
option2: The legend of Bhagat Sigh and Chittagong
option3: India Wins Freedom and India Independent
answer: India Wins Freedom and India Independent
explanation:
At the 74th Independence Day celebration on 15th August 2020, the Films Division would screen two documentary films - ‘India wins Freedom’ and ‘India Independent’.
Apart from the above 2 films, 14 selected films on Independence movement were showcased in the “Online Patriotic Film Festival” being organised by the Ministry of Information and Broadcasting from 7th Aug 2020 to 21st Aug 2020 in www.cinemasofindia.com.
